features: 【1080P HD Webcam with Auto Focus】 DEPSTECH HD Webcam with a 2MP CMOS features up to a 1080p resolution at 30 fps. With auto focus, this webcam can capture the image more quickly. Delivers a crystal clear image quality for video call, conference, online classes, gaming, etc.

【Webcam with Privacy Cover & 65° View Angle】 The privacy cover for the DEPSTECH PC Webcam covers the lens which can perfect to help your privacy security. With the 65°view angle, the desktop webcam keeps you at the center of view without exposing too much details about the environment of your home or office.

【Webcam with Microphone & Noise-Canceling】 DEPSTECH web camera built-in dual microphone, it is available to pick up your voice and filter out background noise automatically, enabling you to enjoy clearer voice for hassle-free communication. Even in noisy surroundings you can capture the sounds you want.

【Plug and Play USB Webcam&Rotatable Clip】 DEPSTECH computer webcam is easy to be used by just plugging it with the USB 2.0 cable to the computer, no need to install any driver to make this webcam work. The rotatable clip makes it easier to mount on the devices like computers, laptop, desktop, tripod, LCD screen. Also you can just put it on the desk.

【Widely Compatible】 The webcam for desktop is compatible with Facetime, Zoom, Facebook, Skype, YouTube, PotPlayer and etc. DEPSTECH computer camera is suitable for many operation systems including Windows XP（SP2,SP3)/Vista /7/8/10 /Mac OS and etc.You can use this web camera for online studying, conference, meeting, gaming, video calling and recording.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1080P HD Webcam DEPSTECH HD webcam is adopted with 1920*1080 high definition lens, displaying a fast smooth video at 30 frames per second. With automatic low light correction, this PC webcam can show details clearly and stream clear video even in low light condition. Webcam with Dual Microphone The webcam with microphone with automatic noise reduction make your voice clearer and stereophonic under background noise.The built-in dual microphone makes the communication superior and realistic for you while video calls. Plug and Play USB Webcam Easily set up, no additional drivers or software required, this webcam can easily plug and play, simply connect HD webcam to your laptop, desktop, computer or Smart TV with the USB 2.0 cable.

Various Applicable Webcam With this HD webcam, you can start your excellent video time for live streaming, gaming, online classes, group video call, conference, etc. Broad Compatibility Most of video software and computer systems are supported by this 1080P webcam. This PC webcam can works with video software like Zoom, Skype, Facebook, YouTube, Face Time and etc. As for the computer systems, it's suitable for Windows XP/Vista /7/8/10 /Mac OS and etc. Easily Set Up The flexible adjustable clip support 360 degrees horizontal adjustment and webcam clip can be adjusted in 180 degrees. You can also just put the webcam on the desktop to let it stand alone. (A tripod is included. )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Starter Webcam!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is my first webcam and I have to say it was definitely a great buy. The quality of the camera is amazing for the price I got it for, the microphone is a bit buzzy but still there and works fine. Setting it up was a very simple process. Plug it in via USB port, open whatever application that utilizes a Webcam and you're done! The kit comes with a screen cover so you can physically block the image from being shown, the stand is pretty good but I would suggest using the mounting feature as it is in a good position and out of the way . I used it to live stream a video game and was quite pleased with the results, probably good with live video calls like zoom, 1080p and everything. Overall I'm very happy with this product, it's a great budget Webcam that has all a Webcam should provide.-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: What I love about this webcam is that it DOESN'T have a wide field of view. Most webcam's these days show your entire room or really give off the fisheye look if you're in a small room. This is wide enough for your face & a little extra but not your entire room. Great for all the Zoom meetings we're having now. It's plug n play, so no problem with installation. The clarity is much better than my default laptop camera. And it works well in low light as well. Comes with a little tripod too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked great...until Windows 11
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 4 different webcams in October 2022 to evaluate which one provided the best picture in a webcam under $35. The Despatach provided the best picture, particularly in low-light, of the cameras I tested. I used this camera on a MacBook Pro running Mojave, a PC running Windows 10, and a 13 year-old Netbook running Linux Mint. It performed well in all three operating systems. Apparently, it is not yet ready for Windows 11. When work upgraded my laptop to one running Windows 11, I can no longer get video (the picture) to work with it, just a gray box. Using the Windows 11 troubleshooter didn't work. Windows 11 cannot find an updated driver and indicates it is working but no picture. If you are running Windows 11 now, you probably need to look for an alternative camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The camera in my HP laptop was not working properly so I figured I'd give the DEPSTECH webcam a try. I found that the brightness and clarity of the image of this plug 'n play webcam is excellent and given the price it's a terrific value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work
reviews.reviewText: Plugged in and never worked. No drivers available to download online. I will be returning this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Made me look like I had a severe case of anemia
reviews.reviewText: The webcam installed just fine and worked right away. I wanted this because the angle was narrow, excluding much of my surroundings. However, I just could not get the right color balance. I even tried two different ones, and on different computers--but the same problem remained. I looked pale as a ghost, no matter what lighting I was in. I put a lightweight pink cloth over my desk lamp to warm up the tone, but that was very annoying and also a fire hazard. I compared my image on zoom with all the others, and I was the only one who looked so faded out. I returned it and ordered a slightly more expensive Logitech, which is working well, with proper facial color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera to supplement the built-in camera, which had a much lower quality.After 2 1/2 months, the camera showed everything in a green tint.I rebooted, I tried it on multiple home systems, and all output was in a weird green tint.I contacted support -- inquiring about a OS upgrade, or how to reset the camera.Support was amazing and sent me a replacement camera with minimal "hassle"! ( I did explain all my troubleshooting steps etc upon contacting them!)The replacement camera came in and works flawlessly! Support followed up and made sure I was happy and working!There are many "high end" devices that don't provide this level of support. I'll be preferring DSPTech for all future purchases!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little webcam for a very good price.
reviews.reviewText: It works find, just as good as the built in webcam installed in our other pc. My husband wanted this for zoom meetings. He had to get some help from me to install it -- he's not real computer literate -- and I had very little trouble installing it other than hearing "well I thought I tried that."

reviews.reviewTitle: Me encantaba esta camara pero ya paso un año de la compra y ya no funciona
reviews.reviewText: La camara habia estado funcionando perfecto pero junto pasando el año de la compra esta fallando y ya no funciona inesperadamente.
Bon rapport qualité prix, mais ça reste une webcam de dépannage
Lieder geringer Dynamikumfang, Gesichter sind bei normaler Beleuchtung völlig überbelichtet.Ton leider ebenfalls nicht gut.Sehr schade da die Webcam sonst überall gelobt wird.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great value for money webcam, well-constructed and seems robust. The fixed focus camera has a fairly narrow field of vision which is ideal for online meetings where you don’t want participants to see the whole room. The camera performs well in low light, artificial light and daylight. Tested the webcam with Microsoft Teams and Skype and no issues; the camera is plug and play straight out of the box. Also included is a mini tripod and privacy lens for the camera, although there is a light on the front to indicate when the camera is in use. The only negative is the quality of the inbuilt microphone isn’t great; it’s fine for online meetings but it’s not the loudest or the highest quality. See the video which was made with the webcam to give you an idea of image quality / sound (aware that amazon compresses videos so might not be a true representation). Overall though it should fit the needs of most users for the likes of online meetings and video calls.
the colours and view from this webcam are not as good as I expected after viewing the review on Youtube.
